title: Ancient Roman Architecture
description: Majestic Roman columns standing tall, a testament to ancient engineering prowess and timeless architectural beauty that continues to inspire modern design.

title: Big Ben at Dusk
description: The iconic clock tower of London, Big Ben stands as a symbol of British heritage and Victorian Gothic architecture against the twilight sky.

title: Sacré-Cœur Basilica
description: A breathtaking view of the Romano-Byzantine architecture of Sacré-Cœur, perched atop Montmartre in Paris, offering stunning panoramic views of the city.

title: Eiffel Tower
description: The iron lattice tower that has become the global cultural icon of France, representing innovation, romance, and the belle époque of Paris.

title: Taj Mahal at Sunrise
description: An ivory-white marble mausoleum and UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Taj Mahal stands as the ultimate symbol of love and Mughal architectural excellence.

title: The Colosseum
description: Rome's ancient amphitheater, the Colosseum represents the grandeur of Imperial Rome and remains one of the most recognizable structures from antiquity.
